name: INSERT NAME
description:
In a world where you are the only one without a weapon, you must use your head and fight to stay alive.

Gameplay:

  • Avoid getting hit by bullets,
  • Dash into enemies to destroy them.
  • Grab light blue boxes for a shield.
  • Grab white boxes for invulnerability.
  • Orange boxes explode!
  • Score as high as you can!

Can you beat my high score of 15,364,159?

Made for the Artic Game Jam (New Year)

Credits to:

  • sfxr.me - 8-Bit sound maker.
  • N3K EN - Audio visualiser tutorial.
  • Carpenter Brut - Turbo Killer - Game music.
